actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A resolution to refer the bill (H.R. 4450) entitled "A bill to clear and settle title to certain real property located in the vicinity of the Colorado River in Riverside County, Calif., to the Chief Commissioner of the Court of Claims.

summary.text: Refers H.R. 4450, entitled "A bill to clear and settle title to certain real property located in the vicinity of the Colorado River in Riverside County, California," to the Chief Commissioner of the United States Court of Claims.

titles.title: A resolution to refer the bill (H.R. 4450) entitled "A bill to clear and settle title to certain real property located in the vicinity of the Colorado River in Riverside County, Calif., to the Chief Commissioner of the Court of Claims.
